name: mars.vim
description:
I was getting tired of black and blue colorschemes , thought I'd try to spice things up a bit :-).  Still I kept the colors dark or muted where I thought it made sense.  Check out a screen shot at http://www.geocities.com/aldy0169/vim/

enjoy.
install_details:
drop it in your '~/.vim/colors' directory  and run ':colorscheme mars'

see ':help colorscheme' for details
